analyzed: dbang po yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so // de las gzhan rmi lam gyi @106a * //
translated: Because it is a sense faculty” is the reason.🔽“🔽Other than that” is the example.🔽“

original: dbang po gzhan no zhes bya ba ni dpe'o //
analyzed: dbang po gzhan no zhes bya ba ni dpe'o //
translated: The other sense faculty in a dream” is the example.

original: khyab pa ni phyed phyi mas ston to //
analyzed: khyab pa ni phyed phyi mas ston to //
translated: The pervasion is shown by the second half.

original: rmi lam du rmis pa dang gzhan pa'i lus ngag gi dbang po ni mtshungs pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: rmi lam du rmis pa dang gzhan pa'i lus ngag gi dbang po ni mtshungs pa kho na yin te /
translated: The sense faculties of body and speech in a dream are exactly the same as those in a waking state.

original: gsal ba'i shes pa skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba'i shes pa skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because they are the causes of the production of clear consciousness.

original: des na rmi lam gyi dbang po'i goms pa las byung ba gang yin pa de ni thams cad la yang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: des na rmi lam gyi dbang po'i goms pa las byung ba gang yin pa de ni thams cad la yang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, that which arises from the habituation of the sense faculties in a dream is the same for all.

original: de nyid gsal bar byed pa ni 'bras bu khyad par med pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid gsal bar byed pa ni 'bras bu khyad par med pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The clarification of that is called “without a special result.”

original: spyir brjod pa'i don khyad par la sbyor ba ni /
analyzed: spyir brjod pa'i don khyad par la sbyor ba ni /
translated: The general meaning is applied to the special meaning:

original: dbang po ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dbang po ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “The sense faculty” is the special meaning.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni mjug sdud pa ste /
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni mjug sdud pa ste /
translated: “Therefore” is the conclusion.

original: goms pas bskyed pa des na'o //
analyzed: goms pas bskyed pa des na'o //
translated: “By that which is produced by cultivation” is the conclusion.

original: dbang po nyid las zhes bya ba ni bems po'i rang bzhin 'byung ba las gyur pa nyid las zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dbang po nyid las zhes bya ba ni bems po'i rang bzhin 'byung ba las gyur pa nyid las zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “From the sense faculty itself” means from the nature of the elements that are matter.

original: de yang sngon gyi goms pa las yin pa'i phyir na shes pa ni shes pa las rag las pa nyid do //
analyzed: de yang sngon gyi goms pa las yin pa'i phyir na shes pa ni shes pa las rag las pa nyid do //
translated: Since that also is from previous cultivation, consciousness depends on consciousness.

original: des na snga ma'i gtan tshigs kyang khyab pa grub pa'o //
analyzed: des na snga ma'i gtan tshigs kyang khyab pa grub pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the previous reason is established as pervasion.

original: skabs nye bar sdud pa ni rnam par shes pa snga ma nyid ces bya bya'o ;
analyzed: skabs nye bar sdud pa ni rnam par shes pa snga ma nyid ces bya bya'o ;
translated: The summary of the section is “from the previous consciousness.”

original: / don ni nye bar len pa'o //
analyzed: / don ni nye bar len pa'o //
translated: The object is the appropriated.

original: bshad zin pa'i rnam 'grel nyid yang rnam pa gzhan du sbyar ba'i don du 'on te zhes 'jug par byed do //
analyzed: bshad zin pa'i rnam 'grel nyid yang rnam pa gzhan du sbyar ba'i don du 'on te zhes 'jug par byed do //
translated: The meaning of the previously explained commentary is applied in a different way in order to introduce the question, “Or is it?”

original: pha dang ma'i rang bzhin ni 'du byed pa'o //
analyzed: pha dang ma'i rang bzhin ni 'du byed pa'o //
translated: The nature of the father and mother is the formative forces.

original: nges pa zhes bya ba sngar ni lus kyis lus byed pa la ltos nas sbyar pa yin no //
analyzed: nges pa zhes bya ba sngar ni lus kyis lus byed pa la ltos nas sbyar pa yin no //
translated: The word “certainly” is to be supplied from the previous verse, which refers to the body of the son in relation to the body of the father and mother.

original: pha dang ma'i rang bzhin de rnam par 'gyur ba med kyang ngo //
analyzed: pha dang ma'i rang bzhin de rnam par 'gyur ba med kyang ngo //
translated: Although the nature of the father and mother is unchanging,

original: 'gyur ba ste mkhas pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gyur ba ste mkhas pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: it changes, because the characteristics of the wise, etc., are seen.

original: pha ma'i rang bzhin de 'gyur yang ste mkhas pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba yin yang /
analyzed: pha ma'i rang bzhin de 'gyur yang ste mkhas pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba yin yang /
translated: Although the nature of the father and mother changes,

original: mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa mkhas pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid du ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa mkhas pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid du ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: it does not change, because the characteristics of the wise, etc., are not seen.

original: bu zhes bya ba ni skabs yin no //
analyzed: bu zhes bya ba ni skabs yin no //
translated: The word “son” is in apposition.

original: nges par 'du byed pa'i rjes su 'jug par khas blangs nas nye bar brjod pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nges par 'du byed pa'i rjes su 'jug par khas blangs nas nye bar brjod pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Having accepted the certainty of the formative forces, the author states: “If the nature of the father and mother is unchanging,🔽it does not change, because the characteristics of the wise, etc., are not seen.”

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni ma la sogs pa'i'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni ma la sogs pa'i'o //
translated: The word “his” refers to the son, etc.

original: gal te de'i 'du byed par 'gyur ba yin na de'i tshe zhes khor nas phyung la mkhas pa la sogs par yang 'gyur ro zhes sbyar ro//
analyzed: gal te de'i 'du byed par 'gyur ba yin na de'i tshe zhes khor nas phyung la mkhas pa la sogs par yang 'gyur ro zhes sbyar ro//
translated: If it were the agent of that action, then it would be a scholar, etc.

original: 'on te zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
translated: “Or” refers to another opinion.

original: 'du byed pa sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: 'du byed pa sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: That which is the agent of the action of teaching

original: 'don du 'jug pa po'am /
analyzed: 'don du 'jug pa po'am /
translated: is the one who makes others recite,

original: 'chad pa po de'i lhan cig byed pa po'i chos de las su gyur pa gang la yod pa de la de skad ces brjod do //
analyzed: 'chad pa po de'i lhan cig byed pa po'i chos de las su gyur pa gang la yod pa de la de skad ces brjod do //
translated: or the one who explains. The action of that which is the co-originator of that dharma is called “teaching.”

original: de'i ngo bo nyid ni mkhas pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid ni mkhas pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: Its nature is the nature of a scholar, etc.

original: 'di skad brjod par @106b 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod par @106b 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: This is what is said:🔽Why wouldn’t it follow that the nature of a mother, etc. would not be a scholar, etc.?

original: ci'i phyir ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi rjes su 'jug par mi 'gyur zhes brjod pa gang yin pa de ni 'gyur ba kho na'o //
analyzed: ci'i phyir ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi rjes su 'jug par mi 'gyur zhes brjod pa gang yin pa de ni 'gyur ba kho na'o //
translated: That is said because it is so.

original: 'di ltar ma la sogs pa la yang 'du byed pa rang nyid byung ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar ma la sogs pa la yang 'du byed pa rang nyid byung ba ni ma yin te /
translated: Thus, the nature of a mother, etc. does not arise by itself,

original: 'on kyang 'don du 'jug pa la sogs pa'i 'bad pa las skyes pa yin no ;
analyzed: 'on kyang 'don du 'jug pa la sogs pa'i 'bad pa las skyes pa yin no ;
translated: but rather arises from the effort of making others recite, etc.

original: / bu la sogs pa yang de bzhin du mi 'gyur ba kho na yin la ma la sogs pa'i 'du byed kyi rjes su 'jug pa yang de tsam gyis grub pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: / bu la sogs pa yang de bzhin du mi 'gyur ba kho na yin la ma la sogs pa'i 'du byed kyi rjes su 'jug pa yang de tsam gyis grub pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: and so on, are just the same. The fact that they follow the formative forces of their mother and so on is established by that much.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.

original: zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
translated: This is the established conclusion.

original: pha ma bzhin du bu la 'dus byas pa yin yang res 'ga' mkhas pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro de lta ma yin par yang ste /
analyzed: pha ma bzhin du bu la 'dus byas pa yin yang res 'ga' mkhas pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro de lta ma yin par yang ste /
translated: Although the son is a formative force in relation to his mother and father, he does not always have the nature of a scholar and so on.

original: slob dpon gyi 'bad pa med par yang yul 'ga' zhig la spyod pa khyad par can dang ldan pa la sogs pas yod pa ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: slob dpon gyi 'bad pa med par yang yul 'ga' zhig la spyod pa khyad par can dang ldan pa la sogs pas yod pa ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, one would not see that some people have a special conduct in certain places without the exertion of a teacher.

original: sngon gyi goms pa med par ni de 'ang mi 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: sngon gyi goms pa med par ni de 'ang mi 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs pa'o //
translated: It is thought that this would not be so without previous practice.

original: rang gi sngon goms pa'i rjes su 'jug pa yang ma mthong bar ci ltar rtog pa snyam na /
analyzed: rang gi sngon goms pa'i rjes su 'jug pa yang ma mthong bar ci ltar rtog pa snyam na /
translated: How can one conceive of this without seeing the conformity to one's own previous practice?

original: rang gi rgyud la zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rang gi rgyud la zhes gsungs so //
translated: One's own continuum is stated.

original: skye ba 'di nyid la'o zhes bya ba bsams pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba 'di nyid la'o zhes bya ba bsams pa'o //
translated: This is the thought.

original: 'o na de bzhin du pha dang ma'i rang bzhin gyi rjes su 'jug par yang ci ste mi rtag snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na de bzhin du pha dang ma'i rang bzhin gyi rjes su 'jug par yang ci ste mi rtag snyam na /
translated: But why does he not always conform to the nature of his father and mother?

original: rgyud gzhan gyi zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rgyud gzhan gyi zhes gsungs so //
translated: Because of the other continuum.

original: 'di yang brjod pa ni khyad par bstan pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: 'di yang brjod pa ni khyad par bstan pa'i don du'o //
translated: The word “also” is for the purpose of teaching a distinction.

original: de nyid brjod pa ni mkhan po zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid brjod pa ni mkhan po zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word “himself” is the teacher.

original: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
translated: “No” is the conclusion.

original: mkhan po'i 'du byed pa'i rjes su 'jug pa ni khyad par las yin par zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: mkhan po'i 'du byed pa'i rjes su 'jug pa ni khyad par las yin par zhes 'brel to //
translated: The conformity of the teacher to the activity of the teacher is due to a distinction.

original: slob ma ni mkhan po'i 'du byed pa mngon par 'du byed pa na /
analyzed: slob ma ni mkhan po'i 'du byed pa mngon par 'du byed pa na /
translated: The student, when the teacher is engaged in activity,

original: de'i bshad pa las de'i 'du byed pa'i rjes su 'jug snying 'dod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i bshad pa las de'i 'du byed pa'i rjes su 'jug snying 'dod par 'gyur te /
translated: wishes to conform to that activity.

original: de med na ste 'dod pa med na /
analyzed: de med na ste 'dod pa med na /
translated: If that is not so, if he does not wish it,

original: thos pa la ma zhugs pa'i skye bo gzhan la de rjes su byed pa nyid ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thos pa la ma zhugs pa'i skye bo gzhan la de rjes su byed pa nyid ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: he is not seen to conform to the activity of another person who is not engaged in learning.

original: des na 'du byed pa de yang brgyud nas rang gi 'dod pa las byung bas na /
analyzed: des na 'du byed pa de yang brgyud nas rang gi 'dod pa las byung bas na /
translated: “Together with what is desired” is the doubt of another.🔽This is the meaning.🔽Here, what is the engagement with one’s own continuum? It is only due to the master’s formation together with what is desired.🔽What is the point of saying “only”?

original: rang gi rgyud kho na las gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: rang gi rgyud kho na las gyur pa yin no //
translated: “Indeed” is the conclusion.🔽“Together with the desired” is the doubt of another.

original: mngon par 'dod pa dang lhan cig pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa dang lhan cig pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is the meaning.🔽Here, what is the engagement with one’s own continuum? It is only due to the master’s formation together with what is desired.🔽What is the point of saying “only”?🔽“Indeed” is the conclusion.

original: gzhan gyi dogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dogs pa'o //
translated: “Together with the desired” is the doubt of another.

original: don 'di yin te /
analyzed: don 'di yin te /
translated: This is the meaning.🔽Here, what is the engagement with one’s own continuum? It is only due to the master’s formation together with what is desired.🔽What is the point of saying “only”?🔽“Indeed” is the conclusion.

original: 'dir rang gi rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa ci yod de mngon par 'dod pa dang lhan cig pa mkhan pos 'du byed pa kho na las yin no //
analyzed: 'dir rang gi rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa ci yod de mngon par 'dod pa dang lhan cig pa mkhan pos 'du byed pa kho na las yin no //
translated: “Together with the desired” is the doubt of another.🔽This is the meaning.🔽Here, what is the engagement with one’s own continuum? It is only due to the master’s formation together with what is desired.

original: zhes bya bas ma chog pa ci yod ces bya ba yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya bas ma chog pa ci yod ces bya ba yin no //
translated: What is the point of saying “only”?🔽“Indeed” is the conclusion.🔽“Together with the desired” is the doubt of another.

original: yin mod ces bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: yin mod ces bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
translated: This is the meaning.🔽Here, what is the engagement with one’s own continuum? It is only due to the master’s formation together with what is desired.🔽What is the point of saying “only”?🔽“Indeed” is the conclusion.

original: 'dod pa'i @107a * //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i @107a * //
translated: “Together with the desired” is the doubt of another.🔽This is the meaning.🔽Here, what is the engagement with one’s own continuum? It is only due to the master’s formation together with what is desired.🔽What is the point of saying “only”?🔽“Indeed” is the conclusion.

original: lhan cig byed pa la ltos mod rang gi yod pa'i rigs la ltos pa nyid de rang gi sems kyi rgyun snga ma la ltos pa nyid kyi 'du byed pa skye bas spangs ba ci yod /
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa la ltos mod rang gi yod pa'i rigs la ltos pa nyid de rang gi sems kyi rgyun snga ma la ltos pa nyid kyi 'du byed pa skye bas spangs ba ci yod /
translated: “Together with the desired” is the doubt of another.🔽This is the meaning.🔽Here, what is the engagement with one’s own continuum? It is only due to the master’s formation together with what is desired.🔽What is the point of saying “only”?

original: des na zhes bya ba ni nye bar sdud pa'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni nye bar sdud pa'o //
translated: “Indeed” is the conclusion.🔽“Together with the desired” is the doubt of another.🔽This is

original: 'de lta 'o na pha'i rang bzhin mdog dang 'du byed pa'i khyad par dang // mngon par 'dod pa la sogs pa rnams kyi rjes su 'jug par la la dang / la la dag la mthong ba 'gal lo snyam na /
analyzed: 'de lta 'o na pha'i rang bzhin mdog dang 'du byed pa'i khyad par dang // mngon par 'dod pa la sogs pa rnams kyi rjes su 'jug par la la dang / la la dag la mthong ba 'gal lo snyam na /
translated: If it is thought that this contradicts the observation that some [sons] follow the nature, color, and disposition of the father, and some follow the mother, and some follow neither,

original: pha ma'i zhes bya ba gsungs so //🔽'di nyid 'chad pa ni gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: pha ma'i zhes bya ba gsungs so // 'di nyid 'chad pa ni gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: [the root text] says from the father and mother.🔽This is explained by If it is thought that 'this contradicts the observation that some [sons] follow the nature, color, and disposition of the father, and some follow the mother, and some follow neither,🔽[the root text] says from the father and mother.

original: 'di la lan ni zhes bya ba ni lan 'debs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la lan ni zhes bya ba ni lan 'debs pa'o //
translated: The answer to this is [the answer is].

original: 'di ga las she na /
analyzed: 'di ga las she na /
translated: Why is this?

original: smras pa srog chags thams cad do //
analyzed: smras pa srog chags thams cad do //
translated: It is said all living beings.

original: yang na pha gcig las skyes pa thams cad do //
analyzed: yang na pha gcig las skyes pa thams cad do //
translated: Or, all those born from the same father.

original: 'on zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis smras pa'o //
analyzed: 'on zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis smras pa'o //
translated: If it is said but, this is spoken by another.

original: thams cad rjes su mi 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni mdog la sogs pa yang rjes su mi 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: thams cad rjes su mi 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni mdog la sogs pa yang rjes su mi 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is said not all follow, meaning that color and so on would not follow.

original: 'gal ba med ces bya bar brjod pa nyid ma yin te zhes bya bas gzhung 'dzugs par byed do //
analyzed: 'gal ba med ces bya bar brjod pa nyid ma yin te zhes bya bas gzhung 'dzugs par byed do //
translated: It is said there is no contradiction, but this is not the case. This establishes the text.

original: de'i rang bzhin gyi rjes su 'jug pa'i bu des pha'i 'du byed de'i rang bzhin goms par byas pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin gyi rjes su 'jug pa'i bu des pha'i 'du byed de'i rang bzhin goms par byas pa'o //
translated: The son who is of the same nature as the father has practiced the nature of the father's formative forces.

original: thams cad pha'i rang bzhin gyi rjes su 'jug par thal ba'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa gang yin pa de mi 'grib par bya ba'i don du dogs par byed pa ni /
analyzed: thams cad pha'i rang bzhin gyi rjes su 'jug par thal ba'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa gang yin pa de mi 'grib par bya ba'i don du dogs par byed pa ni /
translated: Because it follows that everything would be of the same nature as the father, he doubts that this is to be avoided.

original: 'on te ci ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te ci ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: He says, Or else, how?

original: shing gcig las dpangs mthon po la sogs pa'i bye brag tha dad pa'i shing du ma 'byung ba de bzhin du'o //
analyzed: shing gcig las dpangs mthon po la sogs pa'i bye brag tha dad pa'i shing du ma 'byung ba de bzhin du'o //
translated: Just as many trees arise from one tree, with different heights, etc.,

original: pha dang 'brel pa'i shes pa gcig pa las pha'i rang bzhin gyi rjes su 'jug pa dang mi 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa dum 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: pha dang 'brel pa'i shes pa gcig pa las pha'i rang bzhin gyi rjes su 'jug pa dang mi 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa dum 'byung ba'o //
translated: so too, from the one consciousness that is related to the father, many consciousnesses arise that are of the nature of the father, some of which are subsequent and some of which are not.

original: des na thams cad pha'i rang bzhin gyi rjes su 'jug par thal ba ma yin snyam du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: des na thams cad pha'i rang bzhin gyi rjes su 'jug par thal ba ma yin snyam du dgongs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is not the case that it follows that everything would be of the nature of the father.

original: lan du de ltar na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan du de ltar na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: He replies, “In that case . . .”

original: 'on te yang de ltar 'gyur med /
analyzed: 'on te yang de ltar 'gyur med /
translated: “Or else, how?”

original: 'jig rten pha rol ma yin pa'i sems la brten pa ni gegs byed pa med pa'i phyir ro snyam du dogs na /
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol ma yin pa'i sems la brten pa ni gegs byed pa med pa'i phyir ro snyam du dogs na /
translated: because there is no obstruction to the mind that is not of another world.

original: 'di la bshad zin to zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di la bshad zin to zhes gsungs so //
translated: Here it is said, “This has been explained.”

original: thal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i de ma thag tu zhes kyi sgra ni blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: thal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i de ma thag tu zhes kyi sgra ni blta bar bya'o //
translated: The word “immediately” in “because of the consequence” should be supplied.

original: bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The idea is this.

original: 'di ltar shing wa ta las shing du ma 'byung yang shing wa ta'i rang gi rang bzhin ma yin pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar shing wa ta las shing du ma 'byung yang shing wa ta'i rang gi rang bzhin ma yin pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Thus, although many trees arise from a single vata tree, they are not of the nature of the vata tree.

original: de bzhin du pha'i shes pa gcig las bu'i shes pa du ma skye na de'i rang bzhin ma yin par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin du pha'i shes pa gcig las bu'i shes pa du ma skye na de'i rang bzhin ma yin par mi 'gyur te /
translated: In the same way, although many cognitions of the son arise from a single cognition of the father, they are not of its nature.

original: des na sngar gyi shes pa ga cig pa'i @107b rang bzhin gyi rjes su 'jug par thal ba bzlog par dka'o //
analyzed: des na sngar gyi shes pa ga cig pa'i @107b rang bzhin gyi rjes su 'jug par thal ba bzlog par dka'o //
translated: Therefore, it is difficult to avoid the consequence that the previous cognition would continue to exist.

original: des na 'jig rten pha rol po ma yin pa'i sems rten nyid ci ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: des na 'jig rten pha rol po ma yin pa'i sems rten nyid ci ltar 'gyur /
translated: So how could the mind that is not of another world be the basis?

original: pha rol po ci skad brjod pa'i tshul gyi 'jig rten pha rol po'i sems la brten la brten pa nyid kyang med par ston pa ni 'o na 'jig rten pha rol smra ba la yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: pha rol po ci skad brjod pa'i tshul gyi 'jig rten pha rol po'i sems la brten la brten pa nyid kyang med par ston pa ni 'o na 'jig rten pha rol smra ba la yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The world is based on the mind of another person, in the manner in which the other person speaks. But the very basis is shown to be nonexistent: “But in the case of the assertion of another world, too.

original: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
translated: ” “No” is the conclusion.

original: grub pa'i mtha' smra ba'i bsam pa ni 'dus pa la sogs pas 'ga' 'ga' dag tu ni dran pa med pa dang / 'ga' zhig tu ni rjes su 'jug pa yang mthong ba yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' smra ba'i bsam pa ni 'dus pa la sogs pas 'ga' 'ga' dag tu ni dran pa med pa dang / 'ga' zhig tu ni rjes su 'jug pa yang mthong ba yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The intention of the proponent of the conclusion is this: “In some cases, such as in a crowd, we see that memory is absent, and in some cases, we see that memory is present.

original: gal te rnam par g-yengs pas 'du byed pa 'ga' zhig ni rjes su 'jug par yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te rnam par g-yengs pas 'du byed pa 'ga' zhig ni rjes su 'jug par yang 'gyur te /
translated: ” “If it is the case that some action is followed by memory, because it is seen that it is so in some cases,

original: de ltar mthong ba'i phyir ro snyam du gnas pa'i nyes pas go ci ltar snyam pa la skye ba dran pa yang zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de ltar mthong ba'i phyir ro snyam du gnas pa'i nyes pas go ci ltar snyam pa la skye ba dran pa yang zhes gsungs so //
translated: then what is the point of the objection? ” The objection is this: “Memory arises in the case of one who is distracted, because it is seen that it is so in some cases.

original: dbang po las 'das pa'i phyir skye ba dran pa mthong ba ni dgag pa'i yul ma yin no //
analyzed: dbang po las 'das pa'i phyir skye ba dran pa mthong ba ni dgag pa'i yul ma yin no //
translated: ” The memory of a previous birth is not an object of negation, because it is beyond the senses.

original: 'jig rten pha rol ba ma yin pa'i sems rten yin par smra ba ni nyes par 'gyur ba kho na'i zhes ston pa ni /
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol ba ma yin pa'i sems rten yin par smra ba ni nyes par 'gyur ba kho na'i zhes ston pa ni /
translated: But if you maintain that the basis of mind is not a transmigrator, then you are in error.

original: sngon med pa skyed pa la ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sngon med pa skyed pa la ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: To show this, he says, “For the generation of what has not existed before. . . . ”

original: ma la phan tshun chad dang 'brel pa'i shes pa snga ma skyes pa ni rang gi rgyud las ma skyes pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ma yin no //
analyzed: ma la phan tshun chad dang 'brel pa'i shes pa snga ma skyes pa ni rang gi rgyud las ma skyes pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ma yin no //
translated: The prior cognition that is mutually related to the subsequent one is not suffering, because it does not arise from its own continuum.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i gnas skyabs ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i gnas skyabs ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because it is the refuge of that, that is, of the subsequent cognition.

original: gzhan med pa ni rang gi rgyud med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan med pa ni rang gi rgyud med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not another, because it does not have a different continuum.

original: rjes su mthun pa'i gnas skabs gzhan srid na ni /
analyzed: rjes su mthun pa'i gnas skabs gzhan srid na ni /
translated: If another state that is compatible with it is possible,

original: de las gzhan pa'i gnas skabs thob pa na /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i gnas skabs thob pa na /
translated: then when it obtains a state that is different from it,

original: sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba yin gyi de nyid kyi tshe skyes pa la ni de mi srid do //
analyzed: sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba yin gyi de nyid kyi tshe skyes pa la ni de mi srid do //
translated: it becomes suffering. But this is not possible for that which has just arisen.

original: des na de la ni sdug bsngal ba med do snyam du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: des na de la ni sdug bsngal ba med do snyam du dgongs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, he thinks that it does not have suffering.

original: de ltar byas pas gal te pha de nyid nye bar len pa'i rgyud nyid kyis skyed par byed pa yin na /🔽de'i tshe zhes khong nas phyung la /
analyzed: de ltar byas pas gal te pha de nyid nye bar len pa'i rgyud nyid kyis skyed par byed pa yin na / de'i tshe zhes khong nas phyung la /
translated: then,

original: lus gzhan la yang dran par thal zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: lus gzhan la yang dran par thal zhes sbyar ro //
translated: it follows, absurdly, that he would remember the body of the other.🔽In order to avoid the absurdity of the above conclusion, the text says,

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur du 'ong bas bu dang 'brel ba'i zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur du 'ong bas bu dang 'brel ba'i zhes gsungs te /
translated: “the son who is related to him.”

original: rgyud gcig pa'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa'o /
analyzed: rgyud gcig pa'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa'o /
translated: The idea is that it is because they are of the same continuum.

original: thal bar 'gyur ba'i lan gyi dogs pa bsu ba ni /🔽sdug bsngal bas zhes bya ba ste /🔽ma la las byung bas so //
analyzed: thal bar 'gyur ba'i lan gyi dogs pa bsu ba ni / sdug bsngal bas zhes bya ba ste / ma la las byung bas so //
translated: The following is a response to an objection that is anticipated:🔽“If the son is the appropriator of the body,🔽then it follows, absurdly, that the mother would remember the suffering of the son.”

original: bu 'di 'brel pa'i lus la ma dran no zhe na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bu 'di 'brel pa'i lus la ma dran no zhe na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The mother does not remember the suffering of the son because the son is not related to the mother.

original: 'di zhes la bsngogs nas ni de'i gnas skabs ni de nyid kyis zhes da lta kho na smon lam btab pa de nyid legs par bsgrub pa'i phyir yang nye @108a * //🔽bar bkod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di zhes la bsngogs nas ni de'i gnas skabs ni de nyid kyis zhes da lta kho na smon lam btab pa de nyid legs par bsgrub pa'i phyir yang nye @108a * //🔽bar bkod pa yin no //
translated: The text says, “The mother remembers the body of the son,” and then, in order to make it clear that the mother remembers the body of the son because the son is related to the mother, it says, “The mother remembers the body of the son because the son is related to the mother.”🔽The text says, “The mother remembers the body of the son,” and then, in order to make it clear that the mother remembers the body of the son because the son is related to the mother, it says, “The mother remembers the body of the son because the son is related to the mother.”

original: de nyid kyi tshe pha'i shes pa las skyes pa de la ni sdug bsngal yid la ma yin te /🔽rang gi rgyun med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi tshe pha'i shes pa las skyes pa de la ni sdug bsngal yid la ma yin te / rang gi rgyun med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: At that time, the consciousness of the father is not painful, because it is not his continuum.

original: dper na dug gi srin bu drug gis sdug bsngal ba ma yin pa de bzhin du'o //
analyzed: dper na dug gi srin bu drug gis sdug bsngal ba ma yin pa de bzhin du'o //
translated: For example, it is like the pain of the six worms that is not the pain of the person.

original: sdug bsngal yod na ni gzhan bzhin du der rjes su mthun pa dang 'dra ba'i gnas pa ma thob pa yin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //🔽'on te de las rjes su mthun pa'i gnas skabs ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yod pa nyid de /
analyzed: sdug bsngal yod na ni gzhan bzhin du der rjes su mthun pa dang 'dra ba'i gnas pa ma thob pa yin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o // 'on te de las rjes su mthun pa'i gnas skabs ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yod pa nyid de /
translated: If there were pain, then, like another, he would not have attained a state that is similar to and in accord with that.

original: des na sdug bsngal ba yin no snyam na /
analyzed: des na sdug bsngal ba yin no snyam na /
translated: But if there were a state that is similar to and in accord with that, such as the nature of a mother, then it would be painful.

original: de lta na ni 'o na dug gi srin bu la yang sdug bsngal ba yod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na dug gi srin bu la yang sdug bsngal ba yod par 'gyur te /
translated: If that were so, then even the worms that are poisoned would be painful,

original: gnas skabs gzhan srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnas skabs gzhan srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because another state would be possible.

original: de lta yang ma yin te des na de bzhin du de la sdug bsngal med do //
analyzed: de lta yang ma yin te des na de bzhin du de la sdug bsngal med do //
translated: But that is not so, and therefore, just as in that case, there is no pain.

original: de ltar na phas byas pa bus dran pa thal bar bzlog pa dka'o //
analyzed: de ltar na phas byas pa bus dran pa thal bar bzlog pa dka'o //
translated: Thus, it is difficult to refute the consequence that the son remembers what was done by the father.

original: 'o na 'jug rten pha rol po la yang de sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin te drug gi srin bu nyid bzhin snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na 'jug rten pha rol po la yang de sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin te drug gi srin bu nyid bzhin snyam na /
translated: But the other world is not painful for the person who is reborn there, just as the state of a worm in excrement is not painful.

original: 'jig rten gzhan nas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gzhan nas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to this is: “From another world.”

original: gal te dug gi srin bu la sdug bsngal med pa de lta na yang thams cad la ni med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te dug gi srin bu la sdug bsngal med pa de lta na yang thams cad la ni med pa ma yin te /
translated: Even if the worm in excrement does not experience pain, this is not the case for all sentient beings.

original: sngon goms pa'i bag chags kyis bon yod pa dang med pas khyad par yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngon goms pa'i bag chags kyis bon yod pa dang med pas khyad par yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The difference is due to the presence or absence of the seed of the latent impressions of prior habituation.

original: des na 'jig rten pha rol po la ni 'ga' zhig bde ba la 'ga' zhig sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba'i rnam par dbye pa yod pa yin no //
analyzed: des na 'jig rten pha rol po la ni 'ga' zhig bde ba la 'ga' zhig sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba'i rnam par dbye pa yod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the distinction is possible that some sentient beings are happy in the other world and some are unhappy.

original: de nyid kyi phyir skye ba dran pa yang mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir skye ba dran pa yang mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: And it is for this reason that the Buddha said that the recollection of past lives is possible.

original: 'jig rten pha rol nas ma 'ongs pas la ni de ltar 'gyur ba na yin te khyad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol nas ma 'ongs pas la ni de ltar 'gyur ba na yin te khyad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But this is not the case for one who has not come from another world, because there is no difference.

original: yang na de nyid kyi tshe skyes pa la ma la sogs pa'i gnas skabs srid pa'i phyir mngal na gnas pa sdug bsngal bar 'gyur mod /🔽de lta na yang nyes pa yod pa nyid do zhes ston pa ni gzhan yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang na de nyid kyi tshe skyes pa la ma la sogs pa'i gnas skabs srid pa'i phyir mngal na gnas pa sdug bsngal bar 'gyur mod / de lta na yang nyes pa yod pa nyid do zhes ston pa ni gzhan yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Or, at that time, since the state of mother and so on is possible for the father, the embryo would be suffering.

original: gal te ma la sogs pa'i sems bu'i sems kyi rten yin na de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te ma la sogs pa'i sems bu'i sems kyi rten yin na de'i tshe /
translated: Still, there is a fault, as is demonstrated by the words “Moreover, if the mind of the mother and so on is the basis of the mind of the child, then at that time,

original: khong nas phyung la pha mas sdug bsngal myong bar thal te zhes sbyor ro //
analyzed: khong nas phyung la pha mas sdug bsngal myong bar thal te zhes sbyor ro //
translated: it follows that the parents would experience the suffering of being expelled from the womb.”

original: gang gis de skad brjod pa /
analyzed: gang gis de skad brjod pa /
translated: By whom is this said?

original: ci 'ga' zhig tu de lta bu mthong ngam snyam pa la ;
analyzed: ci 'ga' zhig tu de lta bu mthong ngam snyam pa la ;
translated: Is it seen in some place?

original: dper na zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: dper na zhes gsungs te /
translated: “For example,” is stated.

original: lus gzhan la yod pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur pa na zhes bya ba zhes la gzhag pa'o /
analyzed: lus gzhan la yod pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur pa na zhes bya ba zhes la gzhag pa'o /
translated: “When the suffering of another body is experienced,” is to be supplied.

original: rmi lam gyi lus ni gnyid log pa'i lus so //
analyzed: rmi lam gyi lus ni gnyid log pa'i lus so //
translated: The body of a dream is the body of one who is asleep.

original: des na dper na gnyid log pa lus gzhan la yod pa'i sdug bsngal rmi lam gyi lus la myong ba bzhin no zhes rtsa ba @108b gzhan du gdon to //🔽dper na gnyid log pa'i lus gzhan du gtogs pas rmi lam gyi sdug bsngal myong ba bzhin no zhes bya bar gnod pa la ni go sla'o //
analyzed: des na dper na gnyid log pa lus gzhan la yod pa'i sdug bsngal rmi lam gyi lus la myong ba bzhin no zhes rtsa ba @108b gzhan du gdon to // dper na gnyid log pa'i lus gzhan du gtogs pas rmi lam gyi sdug bsngal myong ba bzhin no zhes bya bar gnod pa la ni go sla'o //
translated: Therefore, it is like the pain of another person's body experienced in the body of a dream.🔽The example is easy to understand: it is like the pain of a dream experienced in the body of another person while asleep.

original: sdug bsngal byang bar thal ba'i lan gyi dogs pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: sdug bsngal byang bar thal ba'i lan gyi dogs pa bsu ba ni /
translated: The response to the objection that the consequence is that suffering would be eliminated is anticipated:

original: bskyed par bya ba'i shing zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bskyed par bya ba'i shing zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The tree to be produced.

original: gang gis sa bon btab pas shing gzhan skyes pa de ni skyed par byed pa'i shing ngo //
analyzed: gang gis sa bon btab pas shing gzhan skyes pa de ni skyed par byed pa'i shing ngo //
translated: The tree that is produced by planting the seed is the tree that produces.

original: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: No, is the response.

original: don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning is this:

original: sems dang ldan pa dang / sems med pa rnams kye tshul tha dad par tshad mas mthong ba ni bzlog par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sems dang ldan pa dang / sems med pa rnams kye tshul tha dad par tshad mas mthong ba ni bzlog par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: The difference in the mode of existence of the sentient and insentient is not something that can be refuted by valid cognition.

original: des na gal te mes byas pa'i 'bras bu'i shing 'du byed pa ni shing snga ma'i rnam par 'gyur ba byed pa nyid du ma mthong ba de lta na yang 'bras bu gyur pa'i rmi lam gyi lus kyi rnam par 'gyur ba ni sngar byed lus kyi rnam
analyzed: des na gal te mes byas pa'i 'bras bu'i shing 'du byed pa ni shing snga ma'i rnam par 'gyur ba byed pa nyid du ma mthong ba de lta na yang 'bras bu gyur pa'i rmi lam gyi lus kyi rnam par 'gyur ba ni sngar byed lus kyi rnam
translated: Therefore, if you do not see the action of the fire that produces the result of the tree as the transformation of the earlier tree, then the transformation of the body in a dream that is the result of the body is not the transformation of the earlier body.🔽

original: par sgyur byed yin par mthong ba kho na'o //
analyzed: par sgyur byed yin par mthong ba kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, if you do not see the transformation of the earlier tree as the agent that produces the tree that is the effect of the fire, then you do see the transformation of the body in a dream as the agent that produces the transformed body in the dream.

original: des na pha ma dag gis sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na pha ma dag gis sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the parents experience suffering.

original: de ltar yang ma yin te des nam la gnas pa ni sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur ro //🔽gang gi phyir de ltar gnyi ga ltar yang de sdug bsngal ba ma yin pa des na pha ma dag gis sngar byas pa /
analyzed: de ltar yang ma yin te des nam la gnas pa ni sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur ro // gang gi phyir de ltar gnyi ga ltar yang de sdug bsngal ba ma yin pa des na pha ma dag gis sngar byas pa /
translated: But that is not so, because the one who remains in the dream does not experience suffering.

original: bus dran pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bus dran pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Since it is not like that in either case, the suffering is not his. Therefore, the son remembers what was done by the parents in the past.

original: nyes pa gzhan yang bshad pa ni /
analyzed: nyes pa gzhan yang bshad pa ni /
translated: Another fault is stated:

original: drod gsher las zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: drod gsher las zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: From heat and moisture, etc.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ma la sogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma la sogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there are no parents, etc.

original: blo yod pa yang yin te zhes khong nas phyung la de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang sbyar ro /
analyzed: blo yod pa yang yin te zhes khong nas phyung la de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang sbyar ro /
translated: Thus, it is said, “because of that” and so forth.

original: de ltar yin dang ci 'gyur snyam na /
analyzed: de ltar yin dang ci 'gyur snyam na /
translated: What is the point of saying that?

original: des na ma la sogs pa'i zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: des na ma la sogs pa'i zhes gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is said, “the body of the mother and so forth.”

original: bshad pa gnyis pa la ltos nas rnam 'grel gyi don nye bar sdud pa ni /
analyzed: bshad pa gnyis pa la ltos nas rnam 'grel gyi don nye bar sdud pa ni /
translated: The second explanation is a summary of the meaning of the Pramānﬁ avārtika:

original: de bas na yid kyi zhes bya ba ba'o //
analyzed: de bas na yid kyi zhes bya ba ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said, “the mind.”

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
translated: “If” is the word of the opponent.

original: bu dang 'brel pa'i lus pha'i rjes su 'gro ba gang yin pa de ltar dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bu dang 'brel pa'i lus pha'i rjes su 'gro ba gang yin pa de ltar dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is observed that the body of the son is related to the body of the father.

original: de las tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'i lus las tha mi dad pa'o //
analyzed: de las tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'i lus las tha mi dad pa'o //
translated: “Not different from that” means not different from the body of the effect.

original: de'i rjes su 'gro ba ni snga ma tsam gyis rjes su 'gro ba sgrub pa ni /
analyzed: de'i rjes su 'gro ba ni snga ma tsam gyis rjes su 'gro ba sgrub pa ni /
translated: “Related to that” means related to the mere prior state.🔽The proof of the relation is as follows:

original: de ltar yang blo snga mas bskyed pa nyid do zhes bshad ma thag pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de ltar yang blo snga mas bskyed pa nyid do zhes bshad ma thag pa kho na'o //
translated: It is said that it is produced by the prior mind.

original: pha ma la sogs pa'i shes pa snga ma tsam ni lus tha mi dad par 'gyur ba kho na'o //
analyzed: pha ma la sogs pa'i shes pa snga ma tsam ni lus tha mi dad par 'gyur ba kho na'o //
translated: The mere prior cognition of the father, etc. would be the same body.

original: 'on te zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pha rol smra ba'i dogs pa bsu ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pha rol smra ba'i dogs pa bsu ba'o //
translated: But if, etc. is the objection of the one who maintains the existence of the next world.

original: la ni 'jig rten pha rol gyi lus kyang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: la ni 'jig rten pha rol gyi lus kyang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The body of the next world, etc.

original: thal bar 'gyur ba yang ngo //
analyzed: thal bar 'gyur ba yang ngo //
translated: is the consequence.

original: de bzhin du zhes bya ba tha @109a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du zhes bya ba tha @109a * //
translated: In the same way, etc.

original: dad pa nyid yin pas 'jig rten pha rol de'i rjes su 'gro ba can du yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dad pa nyid yin pas 'jig rten pha rol de'i rjes su 'gro ba can du yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: is the reply. Since there is difference, the next world would not be its consequence.

original: gal te bu la g-yo bag can la sogs pa'i rang bzhin mthong gi pha la ni ma mthong ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te bu la g-yo bag can la sogs pa'i rang bzhin mthong gi pha la ni ma mthong ba ma yin nam /
translated: But isn’t the nature of the son seen to be deceitful, etc., and not that of the father?

original: des na de'i rgyun yin par ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: des na de'i rgyun yin par ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How then could it be his continuum?

original: byis pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs su ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: byis pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs su ni zhes gsungs so //
translated: The reply is: In the state of the child, etc.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni bu la sogs pa mthong ba gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni bu la sogs pa mthong ba gang yin pa ste /
translated: That itself, etc. is that which is seen as the son, etc.

original: gnyi ga la yang byis pa'i gnas skabs na g-yo bag can la sogs pa ni g-yo ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gnyi ga la yang byis pa'i gnas skabs na g-yo bag can la sogs pa ni g-yo ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: In both cases, the meaning is that in the state of being a child, what is fickle, etc. is not fickle, etc.

original: de rgyun nyid do zhes bya ba ni bu rgyun nyid do //
analyzed: de rgyun nyid do zhes bya ba ni bu rgyun nyid do //
translated: The continuity itself is the son.

original: skabs kyis ma la sogs pa'i zhes rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: skabs kyis ma la sogs pa'i zhes rtogs par bya'o //
translated: By context, one should understand “mother, etc.”

original: grub pa'i mtha' ni de yang mi 'thad do zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' ni de yang mi 'thad do zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The conclusion is that that is not tenable.

original: sngar ji skad bshad pa bzhin du nges pa rjes su 'jug pa ma yin no zhes bya bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sngar ji skad bshad pa bzhin du nges pa rjes su 'jug pa ma yin no zhes bya bar shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that, as previously explained, there is no engagement in ascertainment.

original: khyad par brjod pa'i phyir de ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: khyad par brjod pa'i phyir de ni zhes gsungs so //
translated: In order to state the distinction, he says, “That is not so.”

original: mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni bdag po las gzhan du ni 'gro ba du ma dag pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni bdag po las gzhan du ni 'gro ba du ma dag pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is seen, because the movement of the self is seen to be different from the owner.

original: gal te bu ma 'khrul ba med par nges pa med do zhes sngar brjod pa ma yin nam zhes na bden te /
analyzed: gal te bu ma 'khrul ba med par nges pa med do zhes sngar brjod pa ma yin nam zhes na bden te /
translated: If it is argued that it was previously stated that without error there is no ascertainment, it is replied that this is true.

original: thog ma med pa'i rigs rgyud rnam pa thams cad du 'khrul pa med pa yin no zhes bya bar ni nges par mi nus kyi /
analyzed: thog ma med pa'i rigs rgyud rnam pa thams cad du 'khrul pa med pa yin no zhes bya bar ni nges par mi nus kyi /
translated: It is not possible to ascertain that the continuum of the family is beginningless and is not mistaken in any way.

original: 'bad pas nges par brtag par nus pa 'ga' zhig la ni gol ba med par zhes nus pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'bad pas nges par brtag par nus pa 'ga' zhig la ni gol ba med par zhes nus pa kho na'o //
translated: But for someone who is able to ascertain it through effort, it is certainly possible to say that there is no error.

original: dper na ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rjes su 'gro bar ma mthong ba de bzhin du bdag nyid kyi goms pa ni ma yin no zhes ston pa ni /
analyzed: dper na ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rjes su 'gro bar ma mthong ba de bzhin du bdag nyid kyi goms pa ni ma yin no zhes ston pa ni /
translated: Just as one does not see the nature of a mother, etc., following after oneself, in the same way, one does not see the habit-energy of oneself.

original: bdag nyid kyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is shown by the words “of oneself.”

original: g-yo bag la sogs pa'i khyad par de'o //
analyzed: g-yo bag la sogs pa'i khyad par de'o //
translated: The difference is that it is fickle, etc.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni mjug sdud pa'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni mjug sdud pa'o //
translated: “Therefore” concludes the discussion.

original: gal te g-yo bag la sogs pa yang de dang tha mi dad pa yin no zhes sngar bshad zin pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te g-yo bag la sogs pa yang de dang tha mi dad pa yin no zhes sngar bshad zin pa ma yin nam /
translated: But wasn’t it explained earlier that fickleness, etc., are not different from it?

original: des na ji ltar 'jig rten snga ma rjes su dpog snyam na /
analyzed: des na ji ltar 'jig rten snga ma rjes su dpog snyam na /
translated: So how can the previous world be inferred?

original: sems 'byung ba chen po zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: sems 'byung ba chen po zhes gsungs so //
translated: The mind is the great element.

original: gal te sems 'byung ba chen po'i rnam par 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: gal te sems 'byung ba chen po'i rnam par 'gyur ba'am /
translated: If the mind is the great element, then how can it be fickle, etc.?

original: 'byung ba chen po dang tha mi dang po nyid yin yang /
analyzed: 'byung ba chen po dang tha mi dang po nyid yin yang /
translated: although it is not different from the great elements,

original: de ltar na yang de 'dra ba'i 'du byed pa ma mthong ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar na yang de 'dra ba'i 'du byed pa ma mthong ba'i phyir /
translated: nevertheless, since such an agent is not seen,

original: 'jig rten snga ma dang phyir ma'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i 'byung ba chen po nyid rjes su dpog pa yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten snga ma dang phyir ma'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i 'byung ba chen po nyid rjes su dpog pa yin no //
translated: the great elements that are the nature of the previous and later worlds are inferred.

original: des na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'byung ba chen po'i rnam par 'gyur ba yin par 'gyur bar 'gal ba ci yang @109b med do //
analyzed: des na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'byung ba chen po'i rnam par 'gyur ba yin par 'gyur bar 'gal ba ci yang @109b med do //
translated: Therefore, omniscience is also a transformation of the great elements. There is no contradiction at all.

original: 'dis ni khas blangs nas brjod pa yin no zhes ston pa ni tha mi dang par ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni khas blangs nas brjod pa yin no zhes ston pa ni tha mi dang par ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This shows that this is stated by accepting.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar zhes so //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes so //
translated: It is said, “because of this.”

original: tha dad med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'dir bcad do //
analyzed: tha dad med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'dir bcad do //
translated: Here, “because of non-difference” is supplied.

original: de'i phyir lus la 'ang yon tan 'gyur zhes bya ba ni tha mi dad pa de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir lus la 'ang yon tan 'gyur zhes bya ba ni tha mi dad pa de'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, it is said, “the body would also have the qualities.” Because of that non-difference.

original: thos pa la sogs pa'i 'du byed pa bsal bar 'gyur ro zhes rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: thos pa la sogs pa'i 'du byed pa bsal bar 'gyur ro zhes rtogs par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that the activity of hearing and so on would be eliminated.

original: 'on te yang lus la ni tha dad pa med pa yin yang /
analyzed: 'on te yang lus la ni tha dad pa med pa yin yang /
translated: But if you think that although there is no difference in the body,

original: yon tan 'ga' yang gsal ba ma yin no snyam na des na 'di la yang mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa ni yon tan zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: yon tan 'ga' yang gsal ba ma yin no snyam na des na 'di la yang mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa ni yon tan zhes bya ba ste /
translated: no quality is manifest at all, then it is said that this is not so, that is, the quality is not manifest.

original: dper na zhes sbrel bar bya'o //
analyzed: dper na zhes sbrel bar bya'o //
translated: The word “like” should be supplied.

original: des nad par na nag po la sogs pa lus kyi yon tan gsal ba de bzhin du 'di yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: des nad par na nag po la sogs pa lus kyi yon tan gsal ba de bzhin du 'di yang 'gyur te /
translated: Just as the quality of the body, such as blackness, is manifest in the sick person, so it is in this case,

original: tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because there is no difference.

original: sems la 'du byed pa dmigs pa dang // lus la nag po la sogs pa yang tha dad pa med pa nyid las yin no //
analyzed: sems la 'du byed pa dmigs pa dang // lus la nag po la sogs pa yang tha dad pa med pa nyid las yin no //
translated: The quality of the body, such as blackness, is manifest in the sick person, just as the quality of the mind, such as volition, is manifest in the body.

original: tha dad pa med pa de ni sems kyi bdag nyid yin pas na ;
analyzed: tha dad pa med pa de ni sems kyi bdag nyid yin pas na ;
translated: And that nondifference is the nature of the mind,

original: lus la yang sems ltos nas nyams pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: lus la yang sems ltos nas nyams pa med pa nyid do //
translated: so the body is not impaired in dependence on the mind.

original: 'chad pa ni rang gis myong ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'chad pa ni rang gis myong ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The explanation is as follows: “One’s own experience, etc.”

original: yon tan zhes bya ba 'di'i bshad pa ni /
analyzed: yon tan zhes bya ba 'di'i bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of the word “quality” is

original: ci ltar lus kyi yon tan zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci ltar lus kyi yon tan zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “of the body, etc.”

original: gzhan du 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: gzhan du 'gyur ba ste /
translated: It is not that it is transformed into something else,

original: nang du ma 'dus par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: nang du ma 'dus par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: that it is not included within.

original: nang gi zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi dogs pa'o //
analyzed: nang gi zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi dogs pa'o //
translated: The word “within” is a suspicion of others.

original: bzo la sogs pa ni nang gi reg bya'i khyad par yin no snyam du sems pa'o //
analyzed: bzo la sogs pa ni nang gi reg bya'i khyad par yin no snyam du sems pa'o //
translated: They think that craftsmanship, etc. is a special kind of tangible within.

original: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: No, is the reply.

original: byed pa po la sogs pas phyir rol gyi reg par bya ba rlung rtsub mo'i rang bzhin dmigs pa gang yin pa de yang gzhan gyis ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa po la sogs pas phyir rol gyi reg par bya ba rlung rtsub mo'i rang bzhin dmigs pa gang yin pa de yang gzhan gyis ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The external tangible object, which is the nature of rough wind, is not perceived by others because it is the object of the agent, etc.

original: de nyid bshad pa ni mas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid bshad pa ni mas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That itself is explained by the word “mother.”

original: de'i bdag nyid yin yang lus kyi nang gi reg bya'i bdag nyid yin pas na bzo la sogs pa'i phyi rol na gnas pas mi dmigs na /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid yin yang lus kyi nang gi reg bya'i bdag nyid yin pas na bzo la sogs pa'i phyi rol na gnas pas mi dmigs na /
translated: Even though it is of the nature of that, it is not perceived as existing externally, as craftsmanship, etc. because it is of the nature of a tangible within the body.

original: de'i tshe phyir rol gyi reg bya'i rang bzhin rlung reg bya rtsub mo gzhan gyi ci ste ma dmigs /
analyzed: de'i tshe phyir rol gyi reg bya'i rang bzhin rlung reg bya rtsub mo gzhan gyi ci ste ma dmigs /
translated: If that is so, then why is the external tangible object, the nature of wind, the rough tangible of another, not perceived?

original: dmigs pa ma yin na ni rtsub mo de rlung gi reg pa nyid ma yin gyi //
analyzed: dmigs pa ma yin na ni rtsub mo de rlung gi reg pa nyid ma yin gyi //
translated: If it is not perceived, then that roughness is not the tangible of wind.

original: 'on kyang nyes pas nyes pa can du byas pa'i reg bar byed pa'i dbang po nyid rlung dang phrad nas sdug bsngal gyi /
analyzed: 'on kyang nyes pas nyes pa can du byas pa'i reg bar byed pa'i dbang po nyid rlung dang phrad nas sdug bsngal gyi /
translated: However, the sense organ that has been made faulty by the fault touches the wind and there is suffering.

original: myong bskyed par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: myong bskyed par byed pa yin no //
translated: But the sense faculty that is made painful by the pain makes contact with the wind and generates the experience of pain.

original: des na sdug bsngal gyi bdag nyid kyis shes pa rang gi rig rang gi rig par bya ba ni lus las tha dad pa kho na'o //
analyzed: des na sdug bsngal gyi bdag nyid kyis shes pa rang gi rig rang gi rig par bya ba ni lus las tha dad pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, consciousness, which has the nature of pain, is known by itself, and it is known only as different from the body.

original: @110a * // gzhan gyis smras pa /
analyzed: @110a * // gzhan gyis smras pa /
translated: Another says:

original: gang gis reg bya rtsub mo'o rlung dmigs pa de ni rma nyid kyis nus pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gis reg bya rtsub mo'o rlung dmigs pa de ni rma nyid kyis nus pa yin gyi /
translated: The wound itself is capable of apprehending the wind that is a rough tangible object,

original: rlung nyed ni reg bya rtsum  mo ma yin no //
analyzed: rlung nyed ni reg bya rtsum  mo ma yin no //
translated: but the wind itself is not a rough tangible object.

original: des na gzhan gyis de ltar dmigs pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na gzhan gyis de ltar dmigs pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, it is not apprehended by another.

original: dmigs par byed pa'i khyad par gyis zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: dmigs par byed pa'i khyad par gyis zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
translated: The distinction of the apprehender is a tenet.

original: rma dang rma med pa'i rang bzhin gyis dmigs par byed pa khyad par du gyur pa gang yin pa des dmigs par bya ba rlung reg bya rtsub mo dang de las gzhan par dmigs par 'gyur ram ci mi 'gyur ba nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rma dang rma med pa'i rang bzhin gyis dmigs par byed pa khyad par du gyur pa gang yin pa des dmigs par bya ba rlung reg bya rtsub mo dang de las gzhan par dmigs par 'gyur ram ci mi 'gyur ba nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The object of that awareness is the rough tactile object of the wind and not something else.

original: dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid ni gcig gis gzhan du rtogs la de las gzhan gyis ni /
analyzed: dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid ni gcig gis gzhan du rtogs la de las gzhan gyis ni /
translated: The nature of a thing is understood as one thing by one person and as another by another.

original: gzhan du rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not understood as another by that one.

original: de ltar 'gyur na ci skyon snyam na /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur na ci skyon snyam na /
translated: What is wrong with that?

original: de lta yin na zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de lta yin na zhes gsungs te /
translated: If that were so, he says,

original: gzhan du dmigs na'o //
analyzed: gzhan du dmigs na'o //
translated: if it were perceived as another.

original: gnyi ga'am gcig ces bya bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: gnyi ga'am gcig ces bya bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: The idea is that both or one.

original: de ltar yin dang bde ba'am sdug bsngal rang gis rig par bya ba ni lus las gzhan yin par grub pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni gtsor bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de ltar yin dang bde ba'am sdug bsngal rang gis rig par bya ba ni lus las gzhan yin par grub pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni gtsor bya ba'i don to //
translated: Thus, it is established that pleasure or pain is known by oneself and is different from the body. This is the primary meaning.

original: reg bya'i khyad par de ni zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi ste tha dad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: reg bya'i khyad par de ni zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi ste tha dad pa ma yin te /
translated: That special tactile object is not different from the other.

original: de lta yin na ni brjod ma thag pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams pa'o zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: de lta yin na ni brjod ma thag pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams pa'o zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
translated: If that were so, the fault just mentioned would follow.

original: reg pa'i khyad par de ni 'ga' zhig dmigs par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: reg pa'i khyad par de ni 'ga' zhig dmigs par bya ba yin te /
translated: That special contact is the object of observation of someone.

original: de ltar ma yin na yod kyang ma rtogs pas gnod pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar ma yin na yod kyang ma rtogs pas gnod pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were not so, then even though it exists, since it is not realized, it would not be a fault.

original: rang rig pa yin na yang tha dad par 'gyur la /
analyzed: rang rig pa yin na yang tha dad par 'gyur la /
translated: If it were reflexive awareness, it would be different.

original: dmigs pa byed pa gzhan yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin snyam du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa byed pa gzhan yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin snyam du dgongs pa'o //
translated: It is not the case that another that is the object of observation is present.

original: yin nod ce skyon can de lta na yang zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: yin nod ce skyon can de lta na yang zhes gsungs te /
translated: Even if that is so, there is the fault that was stated.

original: rlung dmigs par byed pa nyid yin na'o //
analyzed: rlung dmigs par byed pa nyid yin na'o //
translated: If the wind is the object of observation.

original: nyams su myong ba nyid gnod par rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba nyid gnod par rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa'o //
translated: The experience itself is posited as the fault.

original: 'on te zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
translated: If it is the other,

original: rma'i reg pa rtsub mo de ni rma can de nyid kyis dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: rma'i reg pa rtsub mo de ni rma can de nyid kyis dmigs pa yin te /
translated: that rough contact of the wound is the object of observation of the one with the wound.

original: nye ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: nye ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “because it is near” is that.

original: rma la reg pa zhes bya ba grub pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: rma la reg pa zhes bya ba grub pa'i mtha'o //
translated: The theory is called “contact with a wound.”

original: reg pa'i dus nye ba gzhan yang khyad par med pa'i phyir reg pa de dmigs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: reg pa'i dus nye ba gzhan yang khyad par med pa'i phyir reg pa de dmigs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Because there is no difference between the time of contact and the time of the wound, the wound is perceived.

original: 'on te rma dang rma cad bdag nyid gcig la gzhan ni nye yang tha dad pa kho na'o snyam na /
analyzed: 'on te rma dang rma cad bdag nyid gcig la gzhan ni nye yang tha dad pa kho na'o snyam na /
translated: But if the wound and the one who has the wound are the same, and the other is only different in the sense of being near,

original: da ni shin tu gsal bar gnod pa mi 'thad de myong bar byed tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: da ni shin tu gsal bar gnod pa mi 'thad de myong bar byed tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: then the contradiction is very clear, because there is no difference between the one who experiences and the experience.

original: rang rig pa @110b yin na ni rang rig pa ma yin pa las tha dad par grub po //
analyzed: rang rig pa @110b yin na ni rang rig pa ma yin pa las tha dad par grub po //
translated: If there is reflexive awareness, it is established as different from non-reflexive awareness.

original: bshad pa mdzad pas ni 'di yal bar dor nas rnam pa gzhan du gzhan gyis zhe 'dod bkod de /
analyzed: bshad pa mdzad pas ni 'di yal bar dor nas rnam pa gzhan du gzhan gyis zhe 'dod bkod de /
translated: The author of the commentary, having ignored this, presents the opponent’s position in a different way.

original: 'gog pa mdzad pa ni reg bzhin ba'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'gog pa mdzad pa ni reg bzhin ba'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The refutation is as follows: “If it is like contact . . .”

original: gzhan gyis reg bzhin pa ni reg bya rtsub mor ma dmigs te /
analyzed: gzhan gyis reg bzhin pa ni reg bya rtsub mor ma dmigs te /
translated: The other says: “The one who is in contact does not perceive roughness.”

original: reg bya rtsub mo'i rang bzhin dmigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: reg bya rtsub mo'i rang bzhin dmigs pa ma yin no //
translated: The nature of roughness is not perceived.

original: 'on kyang des ni rnams pa'i cha 'jam pa tsam zhig rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang des ni rnams pa'i cha 'jam pa tsam zhig rtogs pa yin no //
translated: But that is only the perception of the smoothness of the part of the body that is in contact.

original: ma la reg pa rtsub mo yod kyang gzhan gyi ma rtogs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ma la reg pa rtsub mo yod kyang gzhan gyi ma rtogs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Even though the mother’s touch is rough, the other’s touch is not perceived.

original: grub pa'i mtha'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The point of the conclusion is this:

original: kho bo cag gis ni de nyid kyi reg bya rtsub mo dmigs par thal bar bsgrubs so //
analyzed: kho bo cag gis ni de nyid kyi reg bya rtsub mo dmigs par thal bar bsgrubs so //
translated: we have established that the rough touch of that very wound is perceived.

original: gal te reg bzhin pa'i rma'i reg pa rtsub mo'i rang bzhin la gzhan gyi reg kyang ma rig na /
analyzed: gal te reg bzhin pa'i rma'i reg pa rtsub mo'i rang bzhin la gzhan gyi reg kyang ma rig na /
translated: If the rough touch of the wound that is being touched is not recognized as the touch of the other,

original: de'i tshe de las gzhan pa'i rang bzhin 'jam pa tsam reg pa ma yin na /
analyzed: de'i tshe de las gzhan pa'i rang bzhin 'jam pa tsam reg pa ma yin na /
translated: then at that time, the mere smoothness that is a different nature from that is not touch.

original: reg bya rtsub mo'i rang bzhin de nyid reg par ci ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: reg bya rtsub mo'i rang bzhin de nyid reg par ci ltar 'gyur //
translated: How could that very rough touch be touch?

original: reg par mi 'gyur mod snyam na /
analyzed: reg par mi 'gyur mod snyam na /
translated: If you think it is not touch,

original: de'i rang bzhin ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ni zhes gsungs so //
translated: then it is said, “Its nature is . . . ”

original: yul gyur pa rma de nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ste mi bzad pa zhes bya bar 'phangs so //
analyzed: yul gyur pa rma de nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ste mi bzad pa zhes bya bar 'phangs so //
translated: The very nature of the object, the wound, is said to be “unbearable.”

original: de lta yin dang ci bsgrub snyam na /
analyzed: de lta yin dang ci bsgrub snyam na /
translated: If that is so, what is established?

original: ma yin pa ni de dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: ma yin pa ni de dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs te /
translated: because it is not of the same nature as that.

original: de lta yin na zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de lta yin na zhes gsungs so //
translated: If it were like that,

original: gzhan gyi rig pa ma yin par gyur na'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi rig pa ma yin par gyur na'o //
translated: if it were not self-awareness.

original: rma can gyis mi bzad pa'i rang bzhin ni rang gi yig pa yin no zhes bya ba'i skabs so //
analyzed: rma can gyis mi bzad pa'i rang bzhin ni rang gi yig pa yin no zhes bya ba'i skabs so //
translated: The nature of the wound is its own awareness.

original: gal te gzhan gyis rig pa ma yin yang shes pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur gyi //
analyzed: gal te gzhan gyis rig pa ma yin yang shes pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur gyi //
translated: Even if it were not self-awareness, it would be of the nature of non-awareness.

original: de ci ltar rang rig pa nyid de zhes brjod ce na /
analyzed: de ci ltar rang rig pa nyid de zhes brjod ce na /
translated: How can it be called self-awareness?

original: rig pa ma yin pa de dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rig pa ma yin pa de dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs so //
translated: Because it is not of the same nature as that non-awareness.

original: rig pa ma yin pa ni bems po zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rig pa ma yin pa ni bems po zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Non-awareness means being inanimate.

original: de dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa ni rang rig pa dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa ni rang rig pa dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i phyir te /
translated: It is not of the same nature as that because it is not of the same nature as self-awareness.

original: rung ba'i yul na gnas pa nyid yin na thun mong du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rung ba'i yul na gnas pa nyid yin na thun mong du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that if it were the object of something suitable, it would be common.

original: de lta na yang 'byung ba chen po las tha ni dad par ci ste mi 'gyur snyam na /🔽bde ba'am zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de lta na yang 'byung ba chen po las tha ni dad par ci ste mi 'gyur snyam na / bde ba'am zhes gsungs so //
translated: But if that is so, why is it not the case that the self is different from the great elements?🔽Because pleasure, etc.

original: gang gi phyir bde ba la sogs pa rang rig pa nyid yin /
analyzed: gang gi phyir bde ba la sogs pa rang rig pa nyid yin /
translated: are self-cognized.

original: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa 'byung ba chen po las gzhan yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa 'byung ba chen po las gzhan yin no //
translated: Therefore, consciousness is different from the great elements.

original: thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyis tha dad pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽de lta na ni 'o na rten dang brten @111a * //
analyzed: thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyis tha dad pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to // de lta na ni 'o na rten dang brten @111a * //
translated: The meaning is that they are different because of their commonality and their un-commonality.

original: pa'i dngos por 'gyur ro snyam na /
analyzed: pa'i dngos por 'gyur ro snyam na /
translated: But if that is so, then there would be a relationship of support and supported.

original: de'i phyir zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, he says,

original: rten dang brten pa'i dngos por yang zhes bya ba ni de'i bdag nyid lta smos su yang ci yod ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rten dang brten pa'i dngos por yang zhes bya ba ni de'i bdag nyid lta smos su yang ci yod ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: “Even if there were a relationship of support and supported,” i.e., what need is there to mention that they are of the same nature?

original: gal te rten dang brten pa med pa nyid yin na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gal te rten dang brten pa med pa nyid yin na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: If there were no relationship of support and supported, etc.

original: lan du lag pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan du lag pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is, “the hand.”

original: rig pa de 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rig pa de 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the awareness would change.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni nga'i lag par tshor ro zhes bya bar ro //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni nga'i lag par tshor ro zhes bya bar ro //
translated: “Thus” means “I feel my hand.”

original: 'on ci ltar tha snyad byed snyam na /
analyzed: 'on ci ltar tha snyad byed snyam na /
translated: But how is that expression used?

original: lag pa la sogs pa zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: lag pa la sogs pa zhes gsungs so //
translated: He says, “hand, etc.”

original: gang 'dis rnam par gzhag pa tsam du zad do zhes brjod la /
analyzed: gang 'dis rnam par gzhag pa tsam du zad do zhes brjod la /
translated: He says that it is merely a designation.

original: ci ltar na 'byung ba dang rang rig pa la rten dang brten pa'i dngos po mi 'thad snyam pa la 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci ltar na 'byung ba dang rang rig pa la rten dang brten pa'i dngos po mi 'thad snyam pa la 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: How is it that the relation of support and supported is not tenable for the elements and for reflexive awareness?

original: dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The intended meaning is as follows.

original: ci rma la sogs pa dang lhan cig rgyu ba sdug bsngal gyi rten dang brten pa'i dngos por rnam par 'jog gam /
analyzed: ci rma la sogs pa dang lhan cig rgyu ba sdug bsngal gyi rten dang brten pa'i dngos por rnam par 'jog gam /
translated: Is the relation of support and supported posited for the elements and for reflexive awareness, just as it is for the relation of the body and the feeling of pain?
